title: Dwell Magazine – I am digging the type – is it their own?
content:
So I came across dwell magazine yesterday, and am really liking the masthead type – any thoughts on what it is?

[www.dwell.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107174852/http:/www.dwell.com/ "www.dwell.com")
author: bamaurer

comments.content: Possibly a modified version of [Benton](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107174852/http:/typophile.com/wiki/%20http%3A/%252Fwww.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-sans/%20) by Tobias Frere-Jones.
